attributes.action: Pass laws that inhibit the royal family from having any political power, or abolish the monarchy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the monarchy is outdated and it would be a better idea not to have the monarchy as they hold no power and are only a drain on what could be well spent money. The money that their various manors and buildings would sell for would help out the economy a vast amount and could offer new possibilities to build housing estates to help the housing crisis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
